definition: one who has mastered the sutras (Buddhism)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
Tripitaka (602-664), Tang dynasty Buddhist monk and translator who traveled to India 629-645/same as 玄奘

sentences.english: If you do, two loyalty counters are removed from that planeswalker.
sentences.chinese: 若你如此做，从该旅法师上移去两个忠诚度指示物。

sentences.english: Mordo takes his power and says there's too many sorcerers in the world.
sentences.chinese: 莫度夺走了潘伯恩的法力，说世界上的魔法师太多了。

sentences.english: The Magus knows of his potential.
Ma Long is taking intimate letter put up for the night ripely temple, by discovery of master sea empty rabbi.
sentences.chinese: 马龙带着密函投宿圆通寺，被师傅海空法师发现。

sentences.english: Mage Armor no longer reduces the duration of beneficial magic buffs .
sentences.chinese: 法师护甲不再降低任何有益魔法的持续时间。

sentences.english: You see, Rand is the Dragon Reborn, the most powerful male sorcerer to live during his age.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，兰德是再生的龙，当时最强大的法师。

sentences.english: Loyalty is a characteristic only planeswalkers have.
sentences.chinese: 忠诚度是旅法师独有的特征。

sentences.english: An evil wizard or sorcerer develops a new kind of golem.
sentences.chinese: 一个邪恶的法师或术士开发出一种新型魔像。

sentences.english: It was simply not to be found anywhere!
sentences.chinese: 神光法师就找自己的心，心在什么地方？

sentences.english: There's no improbity force from witch and rabbi either.
sentences.chinese: 也没有巫婆和法师的邪恶势力。

sentences.english: A whole crowd went to the temple and asked Master Xin to bring rain.
sentences.chinese: 这一群人就赶去庙里，求辛法师帮忙求雨。

sentences.english: Based on a king Arthur and the sorcerers story.
sentences.chinese: 本剧根据亚瑟王与魔法师梅林的故事改编。

sentences.english: Dharma Master not only emphasizes the support of every person's path, he also energetically promotes the transmission of the Precepts.
sentences.chinese: 法师不仅重视个人的行持，还积极倡导戒法的弘传。

sentences.english: The caster summons a pack of Cu Sidhe .
Li Shutong becomes a monk and stays at the Hupao Monastery with Hongyi as his Buddhist name.
sentences.chinese: 李叔同到杭州虎跑寺出家为僧，法号弘一法师。

sentences.english: Feng dance main, arrive megalith mountain scope, do you then want to quit?
sentences.chinese: 凤舞法师，到达巨石山脉，你便要离开吗？

definition: to implement the law/to perform sorcery
